title: Summoner in desperate need of help

replies.body: I'm running a stable 25mb/s with a ping of 15, thank you very much.
I have this same issue, and it seemed to have started after I joined a clan.  I am not very attached to them, so when I get home from work, I'll quit out and see if I am still having issues.

Hmm...definitely not an issue I hear too much of.  It honestly sounds like there is an issue maintaining a consistent connection with our PvP.net Servers (the client) for a few minutes.  However, it might indicate a corruption with your installation as well.  Given this is much easier to troubleshoot, have you attempted to perform a [clean re-install of League of Legends](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040) to see if this helps to resolve it?

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!
